label: 吉記
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
説明文: The diary of Yoshida Tsunefusa (1143-1200), a mid-to high-ranking courtier, who served as the first Kanto denso, conveying messages between Kyoto and Kamakura. It covers the years from 1166 to 1193 and is an important source concerning the early court-bakufu relationship.
